actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to revise the boundary of Cabrillo National Monument, Calif.

summary.text: Revises the boundary of Cabrillo National Monument, California. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to make minor revisions in the boundary by publication in the Federal Register of a revised map. Permits the Secretary to acquire lands and interests in land within the boundary. Authorizes to be appropriated sums necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to revise the boundary of Cabrillo National Monument, Calif.
